<title level="1" right="Rules">[Reaction Damage](/Rules.aspx?ID=2913)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 125 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Reactions should use lower damage, usually that of a moderate Strike. A reaction that deals area damage might deal low damage, though use such reactions with caution.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
